At Your Service

Digital Consultancy Services

As a business owner, whether you are small or big, the digital world continues to become more and more complex. Let us help you navigate through the maze of social media, communicating with customers online, and helping you with strategies to keep your technology up to date.

Responsive Web Development

Designing for multiple screens is our specialty. Creating a website that resizes to a phone or tablet is important. However, even more necessary is making the right decisions as to how your website should behave on different platforms. We will work with you to make sure your site not only looks great but also functions well.

Search Engine Optimization

Search Engine Optimization has become an important aspect of any website design. We won’t overwhelm you with different approaches to ranking on Google. We work on SEO from the ground up, as we code your website. We won’t make wild promises of pushing you past all your competitors, but we will help you develop a sustainable, long-term roadmap to keep your business in front of any potential customers.

Hosting and Maintenance

Our hosting and maintenance packages are meant to take away the worry of running your website. We take care of backups, security and updates. For a reasonable yearly fee we can take control of your hosting and put your mind at ease everything is professionally cared for.

Our Company

At Style & Story Design we provide web design services for small businesses and individuals. Design is not just photos, fonts and interesting layouts; it’s a way to tell your story. The story of your business. Really, that’s what branding is all about. Every small business has something unique to offer. Let us help you get your story, your unique voice, to shine through all the technology and devices.

We believe in transparency, education and good communication.

As a small business you don’t always have the resources to afford some large agency. We are a small business, like you, and we understand that every dollar is important. Trusting us with your hard earn revenue isn’t something we take for granted.

We work only for select clients and never too many at a time. This keeps us focused on your needs and challenges.

Our Process

As a partner, we strive to communicate openly and clearly. The process of creating a website is a collaborative effort. We work closely with you to make sure your business is properly presented to potential customers and clients.

From images to content, we will help you from beginning to end of the process. Whether you are starting up a business, want to rebrand, or just need to update what you already have, we can assist you all along the way.

We provide you with a client portal to keep track of deadlines, forms, and important milestones. We will establish phone or video calls weekly to discuss any issues and next steps.

Our aim is to collaborate with you to create a website you can be proud to show your clients.
